head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths BORSUK, ELMER M.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths BORSUK, ELMER M.

block.p: BORSUK-Elmer M. On May 19, 2000 at age 87. Beloved husband of Gwendolyn. Brother of Jerry and Anita, and the late Ben and Charles. Big city uncle to many. Long-time public relations executive. Proud University of Wisconsin journalism alumnus. U.S.A.R. Major, retired 1973. Combat Correspondent and Press Liaison from Normandy to Remagen. Interment in Madison, WI. A memorial service to be announced.
